column2: Large tumor running along back, neck, and top of head. Mouse appeared slightly lethargic and slow moving-- could have been due to tumor burden.
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor, half of ribcage
Tumor penetrated ribcage and appeared to take over half of it. Thoracic cavity approximately half filled with tumor mass, pushing up against heart and lungs.
Hard to tell anything about H&L due to tumor penetration.
